articles.author: RTÉ News
articles.title: Spain's coronavirus death toll overtakes China's
articles.description: Spain's coronavirus death toll has overtaken that of China, rising to 3,434 after 738 people died over the past 24 hours.
articles.content:
Spain's coronavirus death toll has overtaken that of China, rising to 3,434 after 738 people died over the past 24 hours, the government said.
Across the world, only Italy now has a higher death toll than that of Spain. In China, where the virus emerged late… [+1443 chars]

articles.author: RTÉ News
articles.title: China reports drop in new imported coronavirus cases
articles.description: Mainland China has reported a drop in new confirmed coronavirus cases as imported infections fell and no locally transmitted infections were reported.
articles.content:
Mainland China has reported a drop in new confirmed coronavirus cases as imported infections fell and no locally transmitted infections were reported, including in central Hubei province, the epicentre of the outbreak in China.
China is ramping up quarantine… [+1906 chars]

articles.title: Number of NI coronavirus deaths rises to seven
articles.description: The number of deaths of patients who tested positive for Covid-19 in Northern Ireland has risen to seven.
articles.content:
The number of deaths of patients who tested positive for Covid-19 in Northern Ireland has risen to seven.
In today's daily update, the Public Health Agency said there were 37 confirmed new cases of the virus in the region following 383 tests.

articles.title: Irish Tech tackles coronavirus
articles.description: Health and technology experts across Ireland are working together to tackle the spread of coronavirus.
articles.content:
Health and technology experts across Ireland are working together to tackle the spread of coronavirus.

articles.title: Zalando says coronavirus shutdown limiting demand
articles.description: German online fashion retailer Zalando said today that restrictions on public life were resulting in lower demand for its products.
articles.content:
German online fashion retailer Zalando said today that restrictions on public life were resulting in lower demand for its products.

articles.title: Cork Racecourse set to open as coronavirus test centre
articles.description: The HSE is working with Horse Racing Ireland to turn Cork Racecourse in Mallow into a testing centre for the coronavirus.
articles.content:
The HSE is working with Horse Racing Ireland to turn Cork Racecourse in Mallow into a testing centre for the coronavirus.

articles.title: Coronavirus: Guide to symptoms, testing and protection
articles.description: A look at the coronavirus symptoms, how you can protect yourself and the testing procedures in place in Ireland.
articles.content:
As things stand, there are 375,498 confirmed positive cases of Covid-19 worldwide, with more than 16,000 deaths. There have been 1,329 cases of the virus in Ireland with seven deaths.
How do I protect myself?
